Task name to display in the Live Editor Task gallery and in automatic code suggestions and completions.
Enter a purpose line for the task
Add folder containing task files to MATLAB path
Task purpose line to display in the Live Editor Task gallery and in automatic code suggestions and completions.
Task icon to display in the Live Editor Task gallery.
Keywords used to show the task in the automatic code suggestions and completions.
Link to the task documentation that opens when the task help icon is clicked.
Add the folder containing the task class definition file and task metadata to the MATLAB path to display the task in the Live Editor Task gallery and in automatic code suggestions and completions.
The folder containing the task class definition file and task metadata must be on the MATLAB path to make the task accessible in the Live Editor.
Unable to configure task metadata. When initializing the task, MATLAB throws this error:\n\n{0}
Image must be a PNG, JPEG, JPG, or GIF.
Task name must not be empty
File {0} is not a valid task class definition file.
File {0} is not a valid live task class definition file because it does not inherit from {1}.
Task metadata successfully configured.\n\nTo use the task in Live Editor, add or save the folder containing the task and resources to the MATLAB path.
Task metadata successfully updated.\n\nTo use the task in Live Editor, add or save the folder containing the task and resources to the MATLAB path.
MATLAB doesn't have write access to the folder containing the task.\n\nWrite access is required to create the resources folder with the Live Task metadata.
Metadata file under the resources folder in the folder containing task is invalid.
Metadata file under the resources folder in the folder containing task is invalid.\n\nSaving metadata for this task will overwrite existing metadata file.
The input argument must be a full or partial file path, or a file name.
Name cannot be a MATLAB keyword. Rename file, and then open.

entry.note: The word letter is to mean an English ASCII character

message.entry: File name ''{0}'' must start with a letter, contain only letters, numbers and underscores, and be shorter than 2049 characters.
File ''{0}'' is not a M file.
Cannot create metadata for files in private folder.

The class {0} cannot be instantiated because it is abstract. Ensure you have implemented all abstract methods, including the setup, generateCode, and reset methods inherited from matlab.task.LiveTask.
Selection must include at least one control.
Selection should not include rich text.
Select location to save definition file
Task class definition file to create, specified as the path to a file with a .m extension.
Unable to find task class definition file. User interface is disabled.
Summary of the task to display underneath the task title.
Task creation failed. Please ensure you have write access for the selected location.

Task output argument name ''{0}'' conflicts with another variable name.

To configure the task, use the top document view

Remove whitespace characters and add square brackets if needed
Convert input value to a numeric array
Ensure the input value is a valid range and adjust if necessary
